lead_paragraph: The San Francisco Giants landed the top-tier closer they have been seeking for months, agreeing to a $62 million, four-year contract with right-hander Mark Melancon on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Melancon, Giants Reach $62M, 4-Year Deal Pending Physical
headline.main: Melancon, Giants Reach $62M, 4-Year Deal Pending Physical

snippet: The San Francisco Giants landed the top-tier closer they have been seeking for months, agreeing to a $62 million, four-year contract with right-hander Mark Melancon on Monday....
